attributes.action: We beg as men and once as soldiers for our government to disclose the extraterrestrial existence
attributes.additional_details:
Dear members of parliament

we the people know extraterrestrials are real and have been visiting earth for many years, we have been told by our astronauts, our militaries, our police forces, our intelligence agencies but not by our governments.

We wish to make peaceful contact as a species with the support and blessing of our queen and country with guidance from our government members who understand our plea.

For the advancement of our species and the protection of our planet, we as men and soldiers beg on both knees for the governments acknowledgement of Extraterrestrial Intelligences visiting Earth.
